channel.title: Guide book / interface

item.title: Guide book / interface
item.dc:creator: @Simba96 Simba96
item.description:
@Simba96 wrote:

i want to make a new book that displays a interface , its a quest interface like 8134 but i have already used that for a minigame the new interface is 12585 i added to clickitem.java and the book opens the interface but after i added the text it dosnt appear and stays like it did before -

if(itemId == 5) {
c.getPA().showInterface(13585);
c.flushOutStream();
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Rezurection-X Infomation”, 8144);
